name: Luke
description: This vacuum cleaner very helpful and doing good work

name: Nastascia Rangel
description: Very modern technology easy to use and very high quality

name: Charles
description: I just open the package and i'm very surpprice...this vacuum looking so good.This product really recommendable

name: Laura
description: I use this product.This product work very fast very satisfiable

name: Ariel
description: I have spent weeks researching robotic vacuums. After comparing and contrasting different models from big-name brands like iRobot, iLife, Eufy, etc, I figured this would be a good budget vacuum. I bought this a few weeks ago and have been using it. Here are my thoughts.

name: Irma Knapp
description: Bought this to help the wife with chores. She was skeptical at first as she looked at the Eufy as a toy. She told me to send it back. I explained that we should try it first and if it doesn't work out, we could send it back.

name: Erin
description: We have a dog, a cat, and a blended family of five teens. I wish I had bought this a long time ago as it would have saved me lots of angst from stepping on messy floors and fighting with teens to vacuum! Day three of using this and I'm loving it

name: Kat
description: Since it appears to be an unspoken requirement to give your robotic vacuum a human name, we called ours Mr. Wonderful. Mr. Wonderful has become quite an important member of our family.

name: William
description: First let me preface this with - this is an amazing vacuum cleaner. We have 3 dogs, and a 2400sqft house. It keeps our floors practically spotless after a nights run. I'd highly recommend buying it, but read on to see why it might annoy you.
